channel.title: Representative on Priceless Trainwreck
channel.description: Recent content in Representative on Priceless Trainwreck

item.title: January 2024
item.description: January 2024 This week I’ve accumulated over 5000 in pledges. I kinda wish this was a joke but I have a genuine addiction. I have no idea what I’m doing. Please help. My girlfriend is pissed about how much I spent on ships this week she said she may actually leave and went back to her parents. I had to tell her I ruined my credit and we can’t get a new apartment this year till I fix it

item.title: January 2020 Set 2
item.description: January 2020 Set 2 LMAO! Sorry none of this janky shit works after almost a decade, so here have a janky ass jpeg to look at. the ship is the fix they’re giving you a ship because it’s the only way to get past the fucking issue What in the world is so wrong with this game that a fix is to log into an entirely different game mode and lay down in a bed?
